tasks.description: Enhanced Planet Minecraft Puppeteer fallback logic - Added 'Navigation' error pattern
tasks.notes: Added 'Navigation' error pattern to catch 'Navigating frame was detached' errors. Unified error patterns between search() and checkHealth() methods. Tested locally: fallback triggers correctly. Deployed to Railway: Planet Minecraft reports healthy status. Fallback logic working as designed (HTTP mode gets 403 from Cloudflare, which is expected).
